segments.text: I can't believe what I'm seeing; the kids are being so sneaky.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy is standing on a stool, reaching for cookies like he's some kind of cookie thief.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: And the girl is just standing there, waiting for her share like it's no big deal.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: They're taking advantage of the situation, and the woman has no idea.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I see the sink overflowing, and the floor is getting all wet and slippery.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's like they don't care about the mess or the danger.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I feel so frustrated, like I want to yell at them to stop.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: But the woman is just standing there, drying dishes, completely clueless.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I think someone needs to step in and put an end to this madness.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's not right, and someone could get hurt.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope they learn their lesson, but I doubt it.
segments.speaker: PAR
